snippet: Despite the prime minister’s icy stare, a veteran of the British press maintains that reporting on Thatcher had its rewards. Conflict makes for good copy and, with Margaret Thatcher, it was never in short supply.
abstract: Despite the prime minister’s icy stare, a veteran of the British press maintains that reporting on Thatcher had its rewards. Conflict makes for good copy and, with Margaret Thatcher, it was never in short supply.
